nodes.text: Essence of Zeltros was a blue perfume that was produced by the government of Zeltros and highlighted on the popular holodrama Zeltrons in Love. Produced from actual Zeltron pheromones, one spritz of the perfume gave the user one hour of the Zeltrons' famous seductive abilities, or magnified the effects of a Zeltron's own pheromones. One bottle held twenty applications, weighed .1 kilograms, and cost one hundred credits.
